name: The Magical and Mundane
description:
A collection of games that are meant to be observed and played in real life -- non-digital games. 

It explores the feelings of the mundane life as well as the magical side of the said mundane. 

From game poems to routine games. From waking up to summoning. There's a game that tries to convince you to day a day off from work, and there's another game telling you how you can collect the stars. Go into this game with an imaginative mind that explores the magic of everyday. The overall compilation brings another view of our normal lives.
